data.name: Iron Man (Infinity War)
data.description: Determined to save the Earth and those he loves, Tony Stark pulls out all the stops, granting positive Status Effects to his allies and dealing blows to those that would harm them.

starItems.name: Iron Man (Infinity War)
starItems.description: Determined to save the Earth and those he loves, Tony Stark pulls out all the stops, granting positive Status Effects to his allies and dealing blows to those that would harm them.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for primary target

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for primary target.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for primary target.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for primary target.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for primary target.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for adjacent targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for all targets.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, reduce Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color> for primary target

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for primary target.
 > Reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> for adjacent targets.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> and Thor (Infinity War) allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary and secondary attacks
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all secondary attacks

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> and Thor (Infinity War) allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all secondary attacks.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> and Thor (Infinity War) allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all secondary attacks.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> and Thor (Infinity War) allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all secondary attacks.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> and Thor (Infinity War) allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to all secondary attacks.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> and Thor (Infinity War) allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all secondary attacks.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>360%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>360%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> and Thor (Infinity War) allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all secondary attacks.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing.
If Kestrel is an active ally, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>270%</color> Piercing instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> and Thor (Infinity War) allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
If Kestrel is an active ally, +<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to all enemies
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on all enemies

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing, clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects.
If Kestrel is an active ally, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>350%</color> Piercing instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> and Thor (Infinity War) allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
If Kestrel is an active ally, +<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to primary target

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing, clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects.
If Kestrel is an active ally, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>430%</color> Piercing instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> and Thor (Infinity War) allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
If Kestrel is an active ally, +<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>210%</color> Piercing, clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, and apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
If Kestrel is an active ally, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>510%</color> Piercing instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> and Thor (Infinity War) allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Spread all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, on self to a random Thor (Infinity War) ally

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>240%</color> Piercing, clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, and apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
If Kestrel is an active ally, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>510%</color> Piercing instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.
Spread all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, on self to a random Thor (Infinity War) ally.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> and Thor (Infinity War) allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to all enemies
Spread all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, on self to all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing, clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, and apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
If Kestrel is an active ally, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>510%</color> Piercing instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.
Spread all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, on self to all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies and a random Thor (Infinity War) ally.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> and Thor (Infinity War) allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
If Kestrel is an active ally, +<color=#86e619>90%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to all enemies with <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing, clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, and apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
If Kestrel is an active ally, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>600%</color> Piercing instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target.
Spread all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, on self to all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies and a random Thor (Infinity War) ally.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> and Thor (Infinity War) allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to all enemies with <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

1.description:
When a positive effect is applied to this character, any <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally, or a Thor (Infinity War) ally, heal all allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, lower Resistance by <color=#86e619>30%</color> for all enemies with <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
When a Rescue ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to that character and <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to this character
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage

2.description:
When a positive effect is applied to this character, any <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally, or a Thor (Infinity War) ally, heal all allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When a Rescue ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to that character and <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to this character.

 In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
 > Lower Resistance by <color=#86e619>30%</color> for all enemies with <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>.
2.nextUpgrade: When this character or a <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Clear <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> on that character, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to that character

3.description:
When a positive effect is applied to this character, any <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally, or a Thor (Infinity War) ally, heal all allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character or a <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health:
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> on that character.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to that character.
 > If the ally that dropped below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health was Rescue, apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to that character and <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to this character.

 In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
 > Lower Resistance by <color=#86e619>30%</color> for all enemies with <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health

4.description:
When a positive effect is applied to this character, any <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally, or a Thor (Infinity War) ally, heal all allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character or a <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health:
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> on that character.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to that character.
 > If the ally that dropped below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health was Rescue, apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to that character and <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to this character.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.

 In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
> Lower Resistance by <color=#86e619>30%</color> for all enemies with <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> and Thor (Infinity War) allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage

5.description:
When a positive effect is applied to this character, any <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally, or a Thor (Infinity War) ally, heal all allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character or a <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health:
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> on that character.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to that character.
 > If the ally that dropped below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health was Rescue, apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to that character and <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to this character.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> and Thor (Infinity War) allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.

 In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
 > <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
 > Lower Resistance by <color=#86e619>30%</color> for all enemies with <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color>.
